channel.title: Ubuntu
channel.description:
made my whole pc crash and its in the shop getting fixed...if i clicked unbuntu it sayed it couldnt find somthing
if i tyryed to start windows it would reboot.

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

Why did you send it into a shop? i re-formatted my harddrive over 6 times trying to install ubuntu…

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

capazi:

…i couldnt log on my computer if i used ubuntu it came up with the error and said press alt+ctrl+delete to restart and windows would always reboot i couldnt go on the internet or talk in some irc channel

If you installed ubuntu that means you had a livecd you could have booted from right?

Read full topic

item.description:

im on my moms computer.

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

if it’s in the shop getting fixed, how did you post this? when you could have gone to
www.google.com or ubuntuforums.org instead of moparisthebest.com/smf
It could have been fixed by both of these sites!

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If you posted a question, searched on google, or joined the #ubuntu IRC channel on irc.freenode.net your problem would have been fixed within a few minutes most likely. Also try to be a little more articulate, good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

i think he is trying to get sympathy.

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

It was probably a GRUB error that could have been easily fixed. Now that computer repair shop is probably going to over charge you for a simple problem. Whenever you have a problem with your computer, always try to look around on the internet to see if you can fix it yourself first.

Also, if you already took it to the shop, why did you make a thread about it?

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“capazi, post:4, topic:146485”]i putted it on the first hardrive it showed when it opened[br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2007, 12:29:04 AM[/size][hr][quote author=Exception link=topic=200514.msg1781877#msg1781877 date=1190824177]
“couldnt find somthing” is hardly an adequate amount of information for us to help you.
[/quote] im sorry i cant remember what it said i know it was somthing to do with gnome i think

[sorry for double post!][/quote]

Thats most likely your windows drive.

EDIT: l2quotefaggot
